hero.title: Software & data engineer passionate about his job
hero.subtitle: Reliable solutions. Clean code. Technical challenges.
section.me.title: Hi! I'm Valérian
section.me.description:
I'm a software engineer at AEM MuTest, building robust Java applications for both web and desktop.
I also work with Python, TypeScript, C#, and C++, always with a strong focus on quality, maintainability, and best practices.

Graduated from Télécom Saint-Étienne, I also freelance on projects related to Minecraft servers and online businesses.
I love well-designed systems, technical challenges, and building long-lasting solutions.
